title: Yzl.augment
content: Yzl.augment augment Augments a given object to a Node *Possible augmentations are specified as implicit casts of the Node type*

title: Yzl.none
content:
Yzl.none 
none 

 Creates an empty node
 
 *Typically used when generating YAML tree conditionally to indicate no node should be generated*

title: Yzl.renderYaml
content:
Yzl.renderYaml 
renderYaml 

 Renders Yzl tree into YAML

title: Yzl.render
content:
Yzl.render 
render 

 Renders Yzl tree into YAML with the default RenderOptions
